item.description:
Quick Links

  • How to Play Military Tycoon
  • The Best Roblox Tycoon Games Like Military Tycoon

In Military Tycoon , Roblox players must build their base, trying their best to attack and not be defeated. The game has plenty of exciting activities. For example, players can destroy bases of NPCs or even other Roblox players using a wide variety of vehicles to get valuable in-game resources. In this article, fans of the game will find Military Tycoon codes that they can redeem for all sorts of great in-game goodies.

Updated July 10, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: It's been a while since we've had new Military Tycoon codes, but this time we found some. Redeem them to get many Diamonds.

All Military Tycoon Codes

How to Redeem Codes in Military Tycoon

Everything that players need to do to redeem codes in Roblox: Military Tycoon is mentioned below. Follow these steps to claim free rewards:

  1. Open Roblox and launch Military Tycoon.
  2. Look at the left-bottom side of the screen and find the Thumbs Up button. Press on it.
  3. In the pop-up menu, insert the code from this article and then click the REDEEM button.

Players should keep in mind that codes in Military Tycoon are time-limited, just like in many other Roblox games. With this in mind, they should try to redeem any active Military Tycoon codes as soon as possible.

How to Play Military Tycoon

Military Tycoon is a game where players must build a base, but there is also a lot of additional content. Base building is similar to other games of this genre, but at the same time, players also organize raids on other bases, complete missions to liberate and capture territories and build tanks, helicopters, and other equipment.

The Best Roblox Tycoon Games Like Military Tycoon

Tycoon is a popular genre that is really quite interesting, especially on the Roblox platform. If players want to find something similar but often stumble upon low-quality experiences, there's no need to worry. Below, they'll be able to find some of the best Roblox games like Military Tycoon :

  • Restaurant Tycoon 2
  • Car Dealership Tycoon
  • The Resistance Tycoon
  • Anime Power Tycoon
  • Princess Castle Tycoon

item.title: Wolverine Game Associate Narrative Director Has Left Insomniac
item.description:
Highlights

  • Marvel's Wolverine's associate narrative director departs Insomniac for CD Projekt Red.
  • CD Projekt Red is ramping up work on its current projects.

An associate narrative director for Marvel's Wolverine recently announced that she will be departing Insomniac Games for a new role at Witcher developer CD Projekt Red. Announced during the 2021 PlayStation Showcase, Marvel's Wolverine is set to be a grittier, more mature game than Insomniac's relatively lighter and mega-popular Spider-Man titles.

Three years later, though, not much has been said about Wolverine , at least officially. The enormous Insomniac data breach in December 2023 leaked huge chunks of sensitive information about Wolverine , such as its plot points, characters, licensing agreements, and voice cast, with even playable alpha builds of the game making their way to dataminers. Even after suffering the devastating leak, Insomniac affirmed in an official statement that development on Wolverine will continue as planned, and a proper reveal will happen when the studio is ready.

While fans patiently wait to see more of Wolverine in the future, it seems to have recently lost some major talent behind the scenes. In a new LinkedIn post, former Wolverine associate narrative director Mary Kenney announced that she recently left Insomniac for a senior writer position at CD Projekt Red, which is currently developing the sequel to Cyberpunk 2077 (codenamed Project Orion) and the next entry in the Witcher series. Kenney lent her talents to Insomniac for over five years, during which she also worked on Spider-Man: Miles Morales and Ratchet and Clank: Rift Apart .

Wolverine's Narrative Lead and Art Director Are No Longer at Insomniac

A few months prior to Kenney's departure, the art director for Wolverine , Aaron Habibipour, also exited Insomniac to work for CD Projekt Red. Kenney didn't specify which project she's working on at the Polish RPG studio, but Habibipour did confirm that he's part of the Project Orion team. Although the departures may seem alarming to fans, it should help to know that the Insomniac title has been in the works for a long time, and the leaks likely prove that Wolverine 's narrative and art direction are set in stone by now. Therefore, Kenney's and Habibipour's departures don't seem to hint at any internal turmoil or development challenges.

Meanwhile, progress for CD Projekt Red's games appears to have ramped up, as the studio wrapped up development on Cyberpunk 2077 some time back to fully focus on its future projects. Wolverine is much further along its development cycle, but neither Insomniac nor Sony have confirmed an official release window at the time of writing. If Insomniac's track record is anything to go by, though, fans shouldn't have anything to be worried about.

item.title: Elden Ring: Shadow of the Erdtree - How Long to Beat
item.description:
Quick Links

  • How Long Is Shadow Of The Erdtree's Main Quest?
  • How Long Does It Take To Complete The Main & Side Quests In SOTE?
  • How Long Does It Take to 100% Shadow Of The Erdtree?

Elden Ring was one of the biggest games released back in 2022, and it usually took over 60 hours to beat the main quests without doing any side quests at all. Considering the amount of content, it is no surprise that so many players have found themselves loving the game, even all these years later.

With the release of its DLC, Shadow of the Erdtree, players have been wondering how long it will take to complete the DLC. It features a new area, new storyline, and brand new questlines to complete, making it take some time too. Here's a breakdown of how long it will take to beat.

Updated by Erin Rice on July 9, 2024: Now that players have had more than enough time to truly dive into the DLC and explore the Realm of Shadow, we have a much better understanding of how long it will take each playstyle to complete the game. This update includes more accurate information on the time it takes to complete the DLC.

How Long Is Shadow Of The Erdtree's Main Quest?

  • Just worrying about the main quests: Around 23 hours

The main questline within Shadow of the Erdtree takes most players about 23 hours to complete, depending on whether they rush through it or play it without rushing or worrying about completion time. However, this can depend entirely on playstyles , so players who are prone to wandering around the game's world may find that they are taking longer to finish the game, even if they only focus on the main questline. Additionally, depending on if players are playing on New Game Plus or no t may also play a role in how long it takes to complete the main quest.

How Long Does It Take To Complete The Main & Side Quests In SOTE?

  • Focusing on all the quests in the DLC: Around 35 Hours

If you're one of those players who want to experience all the stories in the game but don't care too much about the exploration and trying to obtain everything, then it will take about 35 hours to complete the main quest and side quests. Again, this is dependent upon playstyles ; if you rush through these quests, you may finish quicker, and if you take the time to stop and explore, it could be longer. Finally, your New Game Plus status can change this length of time as well.

How Long Does It Take to 100% Shadow Of The Erdtree?

  • Completing everything that the DLC has to offer: Around 45 hours

One thing that some players like to do is to see and do everything that games offer them before they put them down. Shadow of the Erdtree added a whole host of new areas (players will enter into the Land of Shadow), quests, weapons, mechanics, upgrades, and so much more. With the addition of all this content comes the fact that obtaining 100% in the game will take a lot longer than just completing the main quest would. In fact, there are so many hidden areas in the game that players could spend countless hours trying to find them (like the area known as Charo's Hidden Grave). Again, this timing does vary depending on playstyles and New Game Plus . However, it seems to take around 45 hours to truly see everything that the DLC has to offer and reach that 100% completion.

item.title: Roblox: My Prison Codes (July 2024)
item.description:
Beginning adventures in My Prison , players must build their prison almost from scratch by hiring workers, expanding the territory, constructing new buildings, and filling cells with new criminals. Eventually, everything, from communicating with everyone on your territory, to improving your car for transporting prisoners, will be your responsibility. Therefore, no matter your progress in Roblox My Prison , using reward codes can bring good freebies.

Unlike many similar games, My Prison does not reward players with ready-made buildings or exclusive personnel. Instead, you will receive a cash reward that you can invest in the desired improvements.

Updated July 9, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: We have updated this article so that you can redeem the latest codes. We've added a few new ones below that offer valuable rewards.

All My Prison Codes

Although My Prison has offered Roblox players many good codes in the recent past, at the moment, you can only redeem a few to get 625 Cash.

  • SUMMER - Enter this code to get 350 Cash. (NEW)

How to Redeem Codes in My Prison

The ability to redeem codes in My Prison is available to any player from the first seconds of gameplay, but finding the suitable tab the first time can be difficult. So, if you are a newbie, here is how you can redeem your codes:

  • Launch My Prison in Roblox .
  • Click on the Manage icon in the lower-right corner of the screen.
  • Go to the Rromocodes tab.
  • Enter the active code in the text field.
  • Click Redeem, after which you will receive your rewards.
  • If the code is no longer active, you will not receive any rewards, and a corresponding notification will appear at the top of the screen.

How to Get More My Prison Codes

Even though a few active codes are currently available to players, the My Prison developers do not plan to stop there. Any holiday or update, including the recent Basketball update, comes with codes. And if you want to know about everything before everyone else, you should visit the Discord channel of this game. In addition, developers @VincainRBX and @Florianne10Dev often share everything new on their X pages.

item.title: July 29 is Going To Be a Sad Day for Xbox 360 Fans
item.description:
Highlights

  • Xbox 360 digital storefront to shut down on July 29, impacting 59 exclusive digital games.
  • Many games have physical variants or will be available on other platforms, but some are exclusive and may be lost forever.
  • Massive discounts on Xbox 360 games and other digital content available before storefront shuts down.

Monday, July 29 is going to be a sad day for Xbox 360 fans because that's the day that the console's digital storefront will shut down. The Xbox 360 was a pioneer when it comes to digital gaming, with its Xbox Live Arcade venture paving the way for the comprehensive digital storefronts that console gamers enjoy today. Digital games offer a level of convenience that physical games do not, but an unfortunate reality of digital titles is that they run the risk of becoming lost to time as players move on to new platforms and storefronts inevitably close down.

The Xbox 360 storefront has been available since 2005, but it will be shut down on July 25. Gamers have had 19 years to buy whatever digital Xbox 360 titles they want, but it's still upsetting to see it shut down and so many games potentially lost to the void. Luckily, many of the games available on Xbox 360 have physical variants or will be available on other storefronts even after the Xbox 360 marketplace shuts down, but there are 59 Xbox 360 exclusive digital games that will be lost forever (barring any unexpected ports, of course) come July 29.

Most of the digital Xbox 360 exclusives are not games that are all that particularly well-known, but there are some standouts that gamers may want to secure before the storefront shuts its doors, like the South Park games that were never released elsewhere. One game that's technically not an Xbox 360 exclusive, Wik and the Fable of Souls , was removed from Steam long ago and will be next to impossible to acquire once the store shuts down, so fans may want to check that out as well.

List of Digital Xbox 360 Exclusives That Are Not Backward Compatible

  • 0D Beat Drop
  • Arkadian Warriors
  • Battlezone
  • Blazing Birds
  • CrazyMouse
  • Crimson Alliance
  • Deadliest Warrior: Battlegrounds
  • Diabolical Pitch
  • Double Dragon 2: Wander of the Dragons

  • Freefall Racers
  • Fruit Ninja Kinect
  • Full House Poker
  • Fusion: Genesis

  • Geon: Emotions
  • Haunt
  • Home Run Stars
  • Hybrid
  • JAM Live Music Arcade
  • Kinect Fun Labs: Air Band
  • Kinect Fun Labs: Avatar Kinect
  • Kinect Fun Labs: Battle Stuff
  • Kinect Fun Labs: Bobble Head
  • Kinect Fun Labs: Build A Buddy
  • Kinect Fun Labs: Googly Eyes

  • Kinect Fun Labs: Junk Fu
  • Kinect Fun Labs: Kinect Me
  • Kinect Fun Labs: Kinect Rush: Snapshot
  • Kinect Fun Labs: Kinect Sparkler

  • Kinect Fun Labs: Musical Feet
  • Kinect Fun Labs: Mutation Station

  • Kinect Sports Gems: 3 Point Contest

  • Kinect Sports Gems: Darts vs. Zombies
  • Kinect Sports Gems: Field Goal Contest

  • Kinect Sports Gems: Ping Pong

  • Kinect Sports Gems: Ski Race
  • Leedmees
  • Mini Ninjas Adventures
  • Panzer General: Allied Assault
  • Schizoid
  • Shooting Love 200X
  • South Park Let's Go Tower Defense Play!
  • South Park: Tenorman's Revenge
  • Spyglass Board Games
  • The Path of Go
  • Totemball
  • Wing Commander Arena
  • Wits & Wagers
  • Wreckateer
  • Yo-Ho Kablammo
  • Zombie Wranglers

There are massive discounts on various Xbox 360 games right now, with some titles marked down by a staggering 90%. Anyone interested in getting more digital Xbox 360 games should boot up their consoles and check out the deals ASAP.

While the Xbox 360 digital exclusives are what most gamers will want to prioritize, there are other things to consider when making one's final digital 360 purchases. For example, gamers may want to look into buying DLC for their favorite Xbox 360 games, not to mention digital versions of games that have had physical releases. After all, there are some massive Xbox 360 game sales going on right now that will help gamers better-complete their digital 360 collection without breaking the bank. There are some original Xbox games on the 360 that have digital versions available in the marketplace and are worth a look as well.

It's worth pointing out that all the backward compatible Xbox 360 games will remain available to purchase on Xbox One and Xbox Series X/S consoles. Gamers will also be able to download any of their purchases even after the store closes. Regardless, it's always sad to see a shutdown of this magnitude, even if the vast majority of gamers moved on from the Xbox 360 long ago.
